nature_language: [当前位置深圳,目标位置北京,旅行人数3,旅行天数5] 我想带父母去北京玩几天，老人对历史文化更感兴趣，旅途不要太辛苦，留足休息时间，吃喝旅行都要方便
nature_language_en: [Current location: Shenzhen, Destination: Beijing, Number of travelers: 2, Duration of trip: 5 days] I want to take my parents to Beijing for a few days. They are more interested in history and culture. The journey should not be too tiring, with plenty of time for rest. Eating, drinking, and traveling should all be convenient.
